articles.title: American Airlines pilots vote to authorize strike amid contract negotiations - Fox Business
articles.description: The Allied Pilots Association, which represents 15,000 American Airlines pilots, said a majority of its members voted to authorize a strike if deemed necessary to finalize a contract.
articles.content:
American Airlines pilots began picketing at airports nationwide Monday to put pressure on the carrier to reach a new contract with their union. 
The Allied Pilots Association, the collective bargain… [+3669 chars]

articles.title: Aerosmith: US rock band announce farewell tour - BBC
articles.description: Steven Tyler and co will say "peace out" to North America from later this year.
articles.content:
US rock 'n' roll band Aerosmith have announced a farewell tour to mark more than five decades together.

articles.title: The No. 1 diet for heart health is the DASH eating plan—here's how it works - CNBC
articles.description: The American Heart Association ranked the 10 best diets for heart health. Here are a few do's and don'ts of the DASH eating plan, which landed the top spot.
articles.content:
What you eat plays a major role in maintaining heart health, but with so many buzzy diets out there, it can be hard to determine how to best support one of the most important organs in our body.

articles.author: Sandee LaMotte
articles.title: Up to 60% of stroke survivors may develop cognitive decline within a year - CNN
articles.description: Up to 60% of stroke survivors develop cognitive decline within a year, and one-third progress to dementia within five years, according to a new scientific statement from the American Stroke Association.
articles.content: Up to 60% of all stroke survivors develop memory and thinking problems within a year, andone-third go on to develop dementia within five years, according to a new American Stroke Association scientif… [+6063 chars]
